name: SPARTANBURG COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist the Spartanburg County Sheriff's Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist the Spartanburg County Sheriff's Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
Assist Spartanburg County Sheriffs Office with issues related to negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service.
